body:
## **2020 Super Bowl Odds** We're building a slick odds comparison tool while the NFL decides if they can start the 2020 season on time. Do you think they can? We're betting -400 it goes ahead as scheduled. Nevertheless, there's still betting markets live. ### **Live Superbowl Odds** - - - ## **Expert Predictions** We can't see Pat Mahomes' Chiefs getting much bigger. We're tempted to have the favourites onside at +700 to start the season. But we'll hold for now. The one value pick that stands out are the Seahawks at +2200. We're expecting Russell Wilson and co to go much deeper in the Playoffs this year. - - - Want more insight? Join the gang.
Dynamice INNEER
